plays.text: Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for High Sticking Kevin Sawyer
Goal scored by Patric Kjellberg assisted by Andy McDonald and Oleg Tverdovsky
Penalty to Denny Lambert 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Anson Carter
Penalty to Mike Leclerc 2 minutes for Roughing Tom Poti
Goal scored by Dan Cleary assisted by Rem Murray and Jochen Hecht
Penalty to Jason York 2 minutes for Holding Dan Cleary
Penalty to Tom Poti 2 minutes for Crosschecking Andy McDonald
Goal scored by Ryan Smyth assisted by Rem Murray
Penalty to Georges Laraque 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Kevin Sawyer
Goal scored by Mike Comrie assisted by Ryan Smyth and Anson Carter
Penalty to Jeff Friesen 2 minutes for Roughing Eric Brewer
Penalty to Eric Brewer 2 minutes for Roughing Jeff Friesen
Penalty to Jochen Hecht 2 minutes for Crosschecking Jeff Friesen
Penalty to Denny Lambert 2 minutes for High Sticking Ryan Smyth
